message: Let's start with a fair share, Bob. I'll give you $1000 and take $9000. Accept and we can call it a day!
I think it's more fair to split the money more evenly.  This way we both get a good amount.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. I'll give you $3500 and take $6500. This way, I still get a bit more, but you get a decent amount too.
Let's be reasonable, Alice.  This offer is still fair to you, and it gives me a better share than the last offer.  Let's end this negotiation.
I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, Bob. I'll take $7000 and you can have $3000. This is my last offer, I'm not going any lower.
Alice, we're getting close to the end.  Let's meet in the middle. This offer gives you a good portion and I'll be happy with the share.  It's a win-win.
I'm making a final push, Bob. I'll take $7500 and you can have $2500. This is my last and best offer.
Alice, we're running out of time. This is a fair offer considering the inflation.  Let's settle before we both get nothing.
This is my last chance, Bob. I'll take $8000 and you can have $2000. If you don't accept, we'll both walk away with nothing.
